Class Stroke

  • java.lang.Object
    • kr.neolab.sdk.ink.structure.Drawable
      • kr.neolab.sdk.ink.structure.Stroke

  • public class Stroke
extends Drawable
    A collection of Dot (including down, move, up Dot)

    CHY

      • drawToCanvas

        public void drawToCanvas(Canvas canvas,
                         float scale,
                         float offset_x,
                         float offset_y,
                         int width1,
                         int color1,
                         int width2,
                         int color2)
        Draw all dot on the canvas object
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas object to draw stroke
        scale - To zoom in or out of scale for stroke
        offset_x - coordinates by moving the draw stroke
        offset_y - coordinates by moving the draw stroke
        width1 - width of complete stroke
        color1 - color of complete stroke
        width2 - width of interim stroke
        color2 - color of interim stroke
